description: This file defines a RecyclerView adapter for displaying categories, where each category contains a horizontal list of videos. It manages multiple nested RecyclerViews and handles focus and scrolling behavior for a TV interface.

classes.name: CategoryRowsAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView adapter for displaying a list of categories, each with a horizontal list of videos.

classes.name: CategoryRowsAdapter.RowVH
classes.description: ViewHolder for a category row, containing the title and a nested RecyclerView for videos.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates a new ViewHolder for a category row.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data to the ViewHolder, setting category title and initializing the nested RecyclerView.

methods.name: requestFocusFor
methods.description: Programmatically scrolls to a specific row and column, and requests focus on the specified video card.
